attributes.action: Stop watching us and controlling our every move
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are supposed to be in a democracy, but we see road charging being used to watch us, ID cards to check us out without any knowledge and being told what we can and can't do. I want my privacy back and I want to smoke, drink or drive wherever and whenever I like, and walk the streets without being watched.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
